Getting Started

Let’s get started with Nemesis Air repository. This page will guide you through the project workflow.

System Requirements

On both Windows and Linux, you will need to install the following software:

  1. Docker & docker-compose, both installable through Docker Desktop.

  2. Python3 for doc generation, installable through Python.

  3. The doc python dependencies, installable through pip install -r requirements-system.txt.

These will be the only requirements to run the project.

Run this project
